title: Spacey multiple-letter font, or graphic?
content:
Hi Folks,

Someone sent me this image wondering if it might be a font. My opinion is that it was probably a graphic made by mixing and overlaying letters from various fonts and adding the 'antennas' afterwards.

Does anyone recognize this as a font?

Thanks,  
- Mike Yanega

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701114729im_/http:/typophile.com/files/spacewhat_4595.gif)
author: bowfinpw

comments.content: It's a font: **[Kingthings Pique'n'meex](http://web.archive.org/web/20140701114729/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Kingthings%20Pique%27n%27meex%20-%20Regular&fid=bf9250296c101d03839432fcdf2b18fb&fsize=60&text=space&fit=1)** free font by Kevin King [2004]
